Basic QP
========

.. include:: ../qp.prob

Python code to solve this is below.

.. literalinclude:: qp.py
      :language: python

After following the python :ref:`install instructions <python_install>`, we can
run the code yielding output:

.. python qp.py > qp.py.out

      :language: none
